data.name: Confirm.User.Delete
data.value: Na o na le bonnete bja gore o nyaka go tloša {0}?

data.name: AllowRegistration.HelpText
data.value: Na o nyaka gore baeti bao ba sa tsebjego ba kgone go ingwadiša mo websaeteng ya rena?

data.name: RegisterUrl.HelpText
data.value: Ka go ikgethela go fana ka URL ya ngwadišo ya setlwaedi

data.name: ProfileUrl.HelpText
data.value: Optionally provide a custom user profile url

data.name: LockoutDuration.HelpText
data.value: Palo ya metsotso yeo mošomiši a swanetšego go tswalelwa ka ntle

data.name: MaximumFailures.HelpText
data.value: Palo ya godimo ya maitekelo pele ga ge mošomiši a ka tswalelwa

data.name: RequireDigit.HelpText
data.value: Laetša ge eba diphasewete di swanetše go ba le nomoro

data.name: RequiredLength.HelpText
data.value: Botelele bjo bo nnyane bja password

data.name: RequireLower.HelpText
data.value: Laetša ge eba dinomoro tša mothalotheto di swanetše go ba le ditlhaka tše nnyane

data.name: RequirePunctuation.HelpText
data.value: Laetša ge eba diphasewete di swanetše go ba le ditlhaka tšeo e sego tša alphanumeric (mohlala, maswaodikga)

data.name: RequireUpper.HelpText
data.value: Laetša ge eba dinomoro di swanetše go ba le ditlhaka tše kgolo

data.name: Success.UpdateConfig.Restart
data.value: Configuration Updated. Please Select Restart Application For These Changes To Be Activated.

data.name: UniqueCharacters.HelpText
data.value: Palo ye nnyane ya ditlhaka tša moswananoši tšeo mongwadi a swanetšego go ba le tšona

data.name: AllowSiteLogin.HelpText
data.value: Na o nyaka go dumelela badiriši go tsena ka go diriša leina la mošomiši le phasewete tšeo di laolwago mo websaeteng ye? Ela hloko gore o swanetše go thibela kgetho ye fela ge e le gore o šetše o hlomile moabi wa ka ntle wa go tsena ka ntle, go sego bjalo o ka itswalela ka ntle ga websaete.

data.name: Authority.HelpText
data.value: URL ya bolaodi goba URL ya moabi yeo e sepelelanago le moabi wa boitsebišo

data.name: AuthorizationUrl.HelpText
data.value: Kgopelo ya tumelelo ya go hwetša setifikeiti sa boingwadišo

data.name: ClientID.HelpText
data.value: ID ya moreki bakeng sa moabi wa boitsebišo

data.name: CreateUsers.HelpText
data.value: Na o nyaka gore badiriši ba bafsa ba hlomilwe ka go itiriša? Ge e le gore o thibela kgetho ye, badiriši ba swanetše go ba ba šetše ba ingwadišetše mo websaeteng gore ba kgone go saena ka go tsena ka ntle ga yona.

data.name: CreateUsers.Text
data.value: Na o na le badiriši ba bafsa?

data.name: DomainFilter.HelpText
data.value: Provide any email domain filter criteria (separated by commas). Domains to exclude should be prefixed with an exclamation point (!). For example 'microsoft.com,!hotmail.com' would include microsoft.com email addresses but not hotmail.com email addresses.

data.name: EmailClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Optionally specify the type name of the email address claim provided by the identity provider. The typical value is 'email'.

data.name: MetadataUrl.HelpText
data.value: The discovery endpoint for getting metadata for this identity provider. Hlaloša fela ge e le gore mokgopedi ga a šomiše mokgwa wo o tlwaelegilego (mohlala, mokgopedi ga a šomiše sebopego sa sebopego sa sengwalwa)

data.name: PKCE.HelpText
data.value: Laetša ge eba moabi wa boitsebišo o thekga senotlelo sa khoutu ya khoutu (PKCE)

data.name: ProviderName.HelpText
data.value: Laetša leina la segwera la moabi wa ka ntle wa go tsena ka ntle leo le tla bontšhwago mo letlakaleng la go tsena

data.name: ProviderType.HelpText
data.value: Choose the external login provider type

data.name: RedirectUrl.HelpText
data.value: URL ya redirect (goba url ya go boela morago) yeo ka tlwaelo e swanetšego go ngwadišwa le moabi wa boitsebišo

data.name: Scopes.HelpText
data.value: Kgopelo ya boitsebišo go tšwa go moabi wa tshedimošo (yeo e arogantšwego ka dikoma). Ge e le gore ga go na le maswanedi ao a beilwego, ditaodišosengwalo tša Sepedi di tla šomišwa ka tsela ye e sa lokago.

data.name: TokenUrl.HelpText
data.value: Sephetho sa go hwetša seswantšho sa go ba le sebopego sa sebopego

data.name: UserInfoUrl.HelpText
data.value: Mafelelo a go hwetša tshedimošo ya mošomiši. This should be an API endpoint or page url which contains the user email address.

data.name: CookieName.HelpText
data.value: O ka kgetha go diriša leina la khukhi la tiišetšo ya setlwaedi wepsaeteng ye nngwe le ye nngwe. Le ge go le bjalo, ka kgopelo lemoga gore ge e le gore o nyaka go abelana khukhi ya tiišetšo magareng ga diwebsaete tšeo di lego lefelong le le swanago, o swanetše go šomiša leina la khukhi leo le sa fetogego. Gopola gape gore go fetola leina la khukhi ya tiišetšo go tla tloša badiriši ka moka ba gonabjale.

data.name: Issuer.HelpText
data.value: Ka go ikgethela motšweletši yo a nago le taodišosengwalo

data.name: Lifetime.HelpText
data.value: Palo ya metsotso yeo mongwadi a swanetšego go ba le yona

data.name: Secret.HelpText
data.value: Ge e le gore o nyaka go hwetša tshedimošo ka botlalo, ka kgopelo bolela ka sephiri seo se tla šomišwago go boloka dikholego tša gago. Sephiri se swanetše go ba le ditlhaka tše 16 goba go feta go netefatša tšhireletšo ye kaone. Ka kgopelo lemoga gore ge o ka fetola sephiri se, dišupommu ka moka tše di lego gona di tla se šome gomme di tla swanelwa ke go mpshafatšwa.

data.name: Token.HelpText
data.value: Kgetha konope ya Create Token go tšweletša token ya phihlelelo ya lebaka le letelele (e šoma ngwaga o 1). Kgonthiša gore o bea setifikeiti se lefelong leo le bolokegilego ka ge o ka se kgone go le fihlelela mo nakong ye e tlago.

data.name: TwoFactor.HelpText
data.value: Do you want users to use two factor authentication? Ela hloko gore o swanetše go diriša kgetho ya Disabled go fihlela o kgonthišiša ka katlego gore Tsebišo ya Mošomo ka go Mešomo ye e Rulagantšwego e kgontšhitšwe gomme dikgetho tša gago tša SMTP ka go Dipeakanyo tša Saete di beakantšwe go sego bjalo o tla itswalela ka ntle.

data.name: IdentifierClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Specify the type name of the unique user identifier claim provided by the identity provider. The default value is 'sub'.

data.name: Parameters.HelpText
data.value: Optionally specify any additional parameters as name/value pairs to send to the identity provider (separated by commas if there are multiple).

data.name: RoleClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Optionally provide the type name of the roles claim provided by the identity provider (the standard default is 'roles'). If role names from the identity provider do not exactly match your site role names, please use the Role Claim Mappings.

data.name: RoleClaimMappings.HelpText
data.value: Optionally provide a comma delimited list of role names provided by the identity provider, as well as mappings to your site roles. For example if the identity provider includes an 'Admin' role name and you want it to map to the 'Administrators' site role you should specify 'Admin:Administrators'.

data.name: SynchronizeRoles.HelpText
data.value: This option will add or remove role assignments so that the site roles exactly match the roles provided by the identity provider for a user

data.name: ProfileClaimTypes.HelpText
data.value: Optionally provide a comma delimited list of user profile claim type names provided by the identity provider, as well as mappings to your user profile definition. For example if the identity provider includes a 'given_name' claim and you have a 'FirstName' user profile definition you should specify 'given_name:FirstName'.

data.name: AuthFlow.CodeIdTokenToken
data.value: Authorization Code + ID Token + Access Token

data.name: AuthFlow.CodeToken
data.value: Khoutu ya Tumelelo + Token ya Phihlelelo

data.name: AuthResponseType.HelpText
data.value: Laetša mohuta wa phetolo ya tumelelo. Khoutu ya Tumelelo ke Khoutu ya Tumelelo yeo e tšewago bjalo ka kgetho ye e bolokegilego go ya ka tlhalošo ya moragorago ya OAuth.

data.name: VerifyUsers.HelpText
data.value: Do you want existing users to perform an additional email verification step to link their external login? Ge o ka tima kgetho ye, badiriši bao ba lego gona ba tla kgokaganywa ka go itiriša.

data.name: AlwaysRemember.HelpText
data.value: Go kgontšha kgetho ye go tla bea khukhi ya go ya go ile gotee le nako ya go fela ga khukhi, yeo e tlago go saena ka boitirišo badiriši nakong ye e tlago ge ba etela websaete. By default the site will use session cookies.

data.name: CookieExpiration.HelpText
data.value: You can choose to use a custom authentication cookie expiration timespan for each site (e.g. '08:00:00' for 8 hours). The default is 14 days if not specified.

data.name: ReviewClaims.HelpText
data.value: Kgopelo ye e tla ngwala lenaneo ka botlalo la dikgopelo tšeo di bušeditšwego ke moabi ka gare ga rekoto ya tiragalo. E swanetše go šomišwa fela bakeng sa merero ya teko. Tumelelo ya ka ntle e tla thibelwa ge kgetho ye e dumeletšwe.

data.name: NameClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Optionally specify the type name of the user's name claim provided by the identity provider. The typical value is 'name'.

data.name: Provider.HelpText
data.value: Kgetha moabi wa go tsena ka ntle

data.name: SaveTokens.HelpText
data.value: Laetša ge eba phihlelelo le leswaro tokens di swanetše go bolokwa ka morago ga go tsena ka katlego. Phošo ke phošo go fokotša bogolo bja khukuku ya tiišetšo.

data.name: LogoutEverywhere.HelpText
data.value: Do you want users to be logged out of every active session on any device, or only their current session?

data.name: AllowHostRole.HelpText
data.value: Laetša ge eba baamogedi ba thekgwa ke moabi wa boitsebišo. Please use careful with this option as it allows the host user to administrate every site within your installation.
